subject: Hurry - Ink and Toner Sale Ends Soon
body:

If after 10 business days from unsubscribing as above you are still receiving email from us, 
please let us know by contacting manager1567@4inkjetsmailer.com.


Hi Subscriber! You are receiving this solicitation because cruiseca@speedy.uwaterloo.ca previously agreed to receive correspondence from Splash Tree. If this service should fail to meet your expectations, feel free to disassociate yourself from our service.
